Uses of Class
ext2API.Volume

    • Uses of Volume in ext2API

      Fields in ext2API declared as Volume 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Volume BufferHelper.volume 
      Constructors in ext2API with parameters of type Volume 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferHelper(java.io.RandomAccessFile file, int block_size, Volume vol)
      This is the parent class of the read and write helpers; these allow greater control of the buffer used to read from and write to the ByteBuffers that access the Volume.
      Directory(java.lang.String path, int inode_num, Volume vol)
      This is the object associated with a file system directory.
      Ext2File(Volume vol, java.lang.String path) 
      ReadBufferHelper(java.io.RandomAccessFile file, int block_size, Volume volume)
      This Buffer Helper facilitates the buffered reading of the Volume's random access file.
      WriteBufferHelper(java.io.RandomAccessFile vol, Volume volume)
      This Buffer Helper facilitates the buffered writing of the Volume's random access file's data to a file.
